classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, developing, and integrating generative AI models and approaches like RAG with LLMs (GPT-4). It also highlights building user-facing software systems around these AI capabilities, using frameworks and cloud technologies, which aligns perfectly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
